DOC.HEADLINE: COUNTERPUNCH : A FOLLOW-UP ON JOSE SANTANA
DOC.TEXT: In an Aug . 30 Counterpunch article , veteran film , TV and stage actor Jose Angel Santana said he had chosen to drive a taxi in Santa Barbara rather than accept the " violent and negative stereotypes " he too often was asked to play as a black actor . Responses to Santana ' s article led to several offers of auditions . On Wednesday at 8 p.m. , he will return to acting with a guest appearance on " Beverly Hills , 90210 " on Channel 11 . He will portray a police_officer .
